content: Can anyone nominate something for beta backport? I would assume so, but I want to check first.

Specifically, I would like to nominate #79956 for beta backport. It's definitely not important enough for a point release of its own, but if we beta-nominate, should we stable-nominate too in case there ends up being a point release?
Anyone can, but I don't personally feel like it needs a backport, especially as a stable to stable regression. Similarly I would not personally stable nominate.

Nominating for beta-backport since this error comes up fairly frequently and the unfixed version is very confusing and annoying, and it's likely that it's even more so for newcomers. (The issue this fixed was P-high because of the reasons I listed.)
